name: Paws Pipe
description:
A small, simple 2D Point and Click based on Scotlands best loved family The Broons! All Paw wants after a hard day's work is a seat at the fire, his paper and his pipe....

I own no rights to these wonderful characters, all credit goes to DC Thomson and Dudley D. Watkins.

This game was made to help me learn Adventure Creator and Unity and as lifelong lover of the Broons I decided what better way to learn than to bring my favourite Sunday Post characters to life...braw!

Controls: Left click - Use
                   Right Click - Examine
                   Hover pointer at top for inventory
